titles.title: Shuttle Workforce Revitalization Act of 2011
To ensure that all of Brevard County, Florida, is treated as a HUBZone, and for other purposes.
Shuttle Workforce Revitalization Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: Shuttle Workforce Revitalization Act of 2011 - Requires, during the period beginning upon enactment of this Act and ending January 1, 2020, that any portion of Brevard County, Florida, not otherwise a HUBZone (heavily underutilized business zone), as such term is defined under the Small Business Act, be treated as a HUBZone for purposes of that Act.
